note:
Queer Elder, Polyam, and I love ridiculous hats.

Axolotl pfp by the ever-delightful pikole (https://www.patreon.com/pikaole)

fields.name: Most niche skill
fields.value: I can tie a knot in a silk foulard/scarf with one hand. On a good day and with some warmup, I can do it faster than your eye can follow

fields.name: Gender
fields.value:
What gender am I? My dear, one cannot *be* gender. One can only *perform* it!

(exit, stage left, flipping a scarf)
